name: Taxi (itch) (yjonas83)
description:
Set the taxi fare, and decide when to hit the road.

Can you make enough money to continue to the next shift?

Use keys [W] & [S] to change the taxi fare.

Use [Space] to hit the road and make some money. The ride takes 30 minutes.

People don't like to pay too much and don't like to wait too much.

As you progress, your reputation as a taxi driver increases. High reputation allows you to take higher fares and people will be more willing to wait for the ride.

Credits Music: “Happy Tribe”, “Lazy Jamming”, “Rasta Jam”, “Salsa Party”, “Bossa Moment”, “The Square”, “Arab Pickpocket”, from PlayOnLoop.com Licensed under Creative Commons by Attribution 4.0
Ca-ching sound effet: https://www.soundboard.com/sb/sound/962818
